items.text: A Song and Psalm for the sons of Korah.
items.plainText: A Song and Psalm for the sons of Korah.

items.text: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
items.plainText: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.

items.text: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
items.plainText: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.

items.text: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
items.plainText: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.

items.text: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
items.plainText: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.

items.text: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
items.plainText: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.

items.text: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
items.plainText: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.

items.text: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
items.plainText: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.

items.text: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
items.plainText: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.

items.text: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
items.plainText: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.

items.text: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
items.plainText: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.

items.text: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
items.plainText: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.

items.text: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
items.plainText: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.

items.text: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
items.plainText: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.

items.text: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
items.plainText: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
